text: @Yamiche Sadly, this the type of distracting chaos the impeached POTUS thrives on. A real leader would speak directly to the American people w a clear, consistent message, focused on safe practices & saving lives. DJT dithers, obfuscates, ignores, LIES. Ppl are dying. #COVID19
